OOC: is Hellpeon ? when did Blacknightmare meet him?




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Although the post says orchestra is in the post it is not the 
> real Orchestra, all three charachters in this post are holograms. 
> Hellpeon is still fighting Ultimo(post gunther! lol j/k post when 
> your ready), Orchestra is still where ever the hell he is I dont 
know 
> where he was last, and the third charachter? Well its a hologram 
but 
> I cant reveal who it is yet.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> And upon those words the room went dark again and then features 
> reappeared, this time it looked like the room Blacknightmare was in 
> first with the same pedestal that the orb came up off of. Slowly 
> three other orbs flew all around Blacknightmare and scanned every 
bit 
> of info about her and everything that has been done before they 
> dissapeared into the pedestal. Slowly three chambers in the floor 
> opened and then three holograms appeared over them, disturbingly 
> lifelike. The first Hellpeon, the second Orchestra, the third 
showing 
> a much larger robot. The Hellpeon hologram walks up to 
Blacknightmare 
> and stares down at her as it laughs evily.
> 
> Hellpeon: "Predacon trash, what makes you think your so smart? You 
> will be destroyed by the Bamphomet and then devoured. I should not 
> even waste my time with you."
> 
> Holo-Hellpeon walks on back over to where he appeared and stands 
> there. Next, the Orchestra Hologram walked over to Blacknightmare 
and 
> placed a hand on her face.
> 
> Holo-Orchestra: "Come my love, The Alliance has been destroyed 
> completely let us go and salvage all their technology and use it to 
> defeat our enemies. Then we can live together in peace.."
> 
> The Orchestra Hologram then stepped away back to his place. Finally 
> the third unknown Hologram steps up to Blacknightmare.
> 
> ????: "Come with me child and together we shall take over the 
> Universe! All shall fall before my will for I am the god of all 
> Infecticons. IF you defy me then death shall be your fate."
> 
> The third being then walks back over to where it appeared over and 
> Misfire floated over to Blacknightmare.
> 
> Misfire: "You must choose one of those three selections and then 
> descend into the chamber beneath the one you choose. Once you have 
> selected your choice you will go to the next level. Where you go 
and 
> what happens to you depends on your choice."
> 
> With that said Misfire descneds into the pedestal over the ground 
and 
> then dissapears with it as it descends.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Blacknightmare:
> > 
> > The femme said "The Bamphomet"
